columns.name: stream_name
columns.description: The name of the stream being described.

columns.name: stream_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the stream being described.

columns.name: stream_status
columns.description: The current status of the stream being described.

columns.name: stream_creation_timestamp
columns.description: The approximate time that the stream was created.

columns.name: encryption_type
columns.description: The server-side encryption type used on the stream.

columns.name: key_id
columns.description: The GUID for the customer-managed AWS KMS key to use for encryption.

columns.name: retention_period_hours
columns.description: The current retention period, in hours.

columns.name: consumer_count
columns.description: The number of enhanced fan-out consumers registered with the stream.

columns.name: open_shard_count
columns.description: The number of open shards in the stream.

columns.name: has_more_shards
columns.description: If set to true, more shards in the stream are available to describe.

columns.name: shards
columns.description: The shards that comprise the stream.

columns.name: enhanced_monitoring
columns.description: Represents the current enhanced monitoring settings of the stream.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the stream.
